detectors.description:
Talent.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Talent.sol#146-151) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Talent.sol#148)
detectors.markdown:
[Talent.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Talent.sol#L146-L151) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Talent.sol#L148)

detectors.description:
Talent.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Talent.sol#178-184) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Talent.sol#179)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Talent.sol#181)
